<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// frame given its type, but the index isn&#39;t a constant for all</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// possible frames.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The switch-index field isn&#39;t at a fixed offset or index, either;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we just work it in where it fits best.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"></CodeLine>
